page.title: 13PUPILS SMOKING HABITS.
page.content: Sample 10% of school-62 male , 61 female.Numbers of 3rd(13-14),4th(14-15) 5th(15-16),6th(16-18) years in proportion. Also three ability bands balanced. 49.6% of pupils smoke,18.7% have done but do not now. Of smokers, males and females equally represented. Lower years have more smokers. Of the top ability band.41.7% smoke,middle 47.4%, low 75.8%.All smokers used cigarettes, 9.8% cigars, no pipes.Of smokers 49.2% use up to 10 cigarettes a week, 32.8% use 11 to 30, 16.4% over 50 a week.Heavier smokers tend to be older and male. 47.5% of smokers have tried to give up.Failure attributed mostly to lack of will and social pressures.39.3% of smokers think their parents do not know that they smoke.26.2% of smokers have been punished at home,31.1% at school.88.5% of smokers are served under age.
